installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Forge Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl

#Fetching version
if [ -z "$MC_VERSION" ] || [ "$MC_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
  echo "Fetching latest"
  MC_VERSION=$(curl -sl https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/index.html | grep -A 2 "Latest" | awk NF=NF RS= OFS=" " | grep -o -e '[1].[0-9]*.[0-9]* - [0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]*' | sed 's/ //g')
elif [[ ! "$MC_VERSION" =~ - ]]; then
  echo "Fetching latest from version $MC_VERSION"
  MC_VERSION=$(curl -sl https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/index_$MC_VERSION.html | grep -A 2 "Latest" | awk NF=NF RS= OFS=" " | grep -o -e '[1].[0-9]*.[0-9]* - [0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]*' | sed 's/ //g')
fi

#Checking if forge version valid
if [[ ! "$MC_VERSION" =~ [1].[0-9]*.[0-9]*-[0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]* ]]; then
    echo "!!! Invalid forge version \"$MC_VERSION\" !!!"
    exit
fi

#Go into main direction
cd /mnt/server

#Adding .jar when not eding by SERVER_JARFILE
if [[ ! $SERVER_JARFILE = *\.jar ]]; then
  SERVER_JARFILE="$SERVER_JARFILE.jar"
fi

#Downloading jars
echo -e "Downloading forge version \"$MC_VERSION\""
curl -o installer.jar -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$MC_VERSION/forge-$MC_VERSION-installer.jar
curl -o $SERVER_JARFILE -sS https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/$MC_VERSION/forge-$MC_VERSION-universal.jar

#Checking if downloaded jars exist
if [ ! -f ./installer.jar ] || [ ! -f ./$SERVER_JARFILE ]; then
    echo "!!! Error by downloading forge version \"$MC_VERSION\" !!!"
    exit
fi

#Installing server
echo -e "Installing forge server.\n"
java -jar installer.jar --installServer

#Deleting installer.jar
echo -e "Deleting installer.jar file.\n"
rm -rf installer.jar
